summary:
•	A tenured Home Health and Hospice Manager with strong experience in team development and compliance.
•	Creating marketing and business development plans
•	Interpreting Medicare, The Joint Commission ( TJC), ACHC, CHAP, URAC and VIPPS for development and implementation of policies/procedures. 
•	Skilled at finding and identifying problems and creating performance improvement action plans.
•	Strong leader and problem solver with exceptional record of achievement in branch profitability and turn-around.
•	Skilled in operations, creating and processes and procedures, managing resources, and turning around unprofitable units.
•	Responsibilities Human Resource i.e. for 350+ employees, recruiting & developing management teams, all function and termination functions, and evaluation of performance.
•	Administrators Certification, Texas 2010
•	During employment with CHS each year accomplished the goals and received bonus for meeting expectations.
•	Accomplished 100%  accreditation with all agencies or hospitals

Specialties: *Operations
*Regulatory Compliance
*Risk Management/Patient Safety
For Home Health, Hospice and Hospital

currentPositions.title: Healthcare Consultant-Specialty,Compounding Pharmacies, Ambulatory Care, Home Health, Hospice

headline: Healthcare Consultant

message.text:
Hey everyone! I’m on the lookout for a new role and would really appreciate your support. I’d love to reconnect with you all, share my experiences, and catch up on what’s new in your world.

If you hear of any exciting opportunities or are open to chatting, send me a message or comment below! #OpenToWork
